shortDescription: Directory traversal vulnerability in img.pl in Barracuda Spam Firewall running firmware 3.1.16 and 3.1.17 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the f parameter.
vulnerabilityName: Barracuda Networks barracuda_spam_firewall Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
